channel.title: [BUG] Unable to Select or See Weapons
channel.description:
[b]GENERAL BUG INFORMATION[/b]
[i][b]LOCATION[/b][/i] Not sure if it was location specific but it occurred at the loading zone for "Surface Tension".
[i][b]DETAILS[/b][/i] After loading surface tension I immediately unloaded back into the previous zone. After doing this I could no longer see my weapon nor could I switch to any of them. It was as though they simply disappeared from my character.
[b][i]SCREENSHOT[/i][/b] ![](upload://8d3A8TZo0X1fp2HdXNhbS5vvy3Z.jpeg)
Also note the top sign of the easter egg is missing as well for some reason?

item.title: [BUG] Unable to Select or See Weapons
item.dc:creator: AtlasNR
item.description:
GENERAL BUG INFORMATION

LOCATION
Not sure if it was location specific but it occurred at the loading zone for “Surface Tension”.

DETAILS
After loading surface tension I immediately unloaded back into the previous zone. After doing this I could no longer see my weapon nor could I switch to any of them. It was as though they simply disappeared from my character.

SCREENSHOT

1920×1080 253 KB

Also note the top sign of the easter egg is missing as well for some reason?

Read full topic
item.source: [BUG] Unable to Select or See Weapons
